prompt: Identify the top 3 AI wearables (rings, glasses, patches) debuted at CES 2026. Compare their interaction logic with the rumored hardware co-developed by OpenAI and Jony Ive. Analyze the privacy regulatory debates triggered by these devices in mid-January 2026.

Review the Venezuelan political crisis from January 3 to January 15, 2026 (including the U.S. capture of President Maduro and its subsequent impacts). In conjunction with the WTI crude oil price trend in early January 2026, analyze the short-term effects of this geopolitical turmoil on the global energy supply chain.

Collect the key economic policy points from Sanae Takaichi’s first street speech for the House of Representatives election on January 27, 2026—specifically whether she mentioned Rapidus (the 2nm chip fab) or any related fiscal support commitments. Also, look up the stock price movements of global semiconductor equipment suppliers ASML and Tokyo Electron in late January 2026 (especially around January 27) and analyze possible drivers (e.g., election expectations, global chip demand, JPY exchange rate, etc.).
Survey large models released in January 2026, comparing capabilities, costs, and application scenarios.

Deeply investigate updates to Claude Code, Cursor, Antigravity, and Codex in January 2026. Analyze the watershed characteristics of AI foundation companies pivoting from 'coding assistance' to 'autonomous agent' R&D paradigms.

Research the specialized 'ChatGPT Health' features launched by OpenAI in January 2026, focusing on privacy compliance for EHR integration. Search for clinical evaluations from Jan 20-25 regarding AI’s ability to predict neurodegenerative diseases based on gait and speech data.

Analyze key supply chain bottlenecks for Tesla Optimus Gen 3 production ramp-up in Jan 2026. Compare the performance parameters of domestic Chinese harmonic reducers vs. Japanese alternatives and track Musk's latest 'AGI vessel' posts on X.

Track the latest progress and planned timeline of SpaceX’s Starship on-orbit refueling demonstration, and assess the impact of this technology on the schedule of the Artemis III crewed lunar landing mission (currently targeted for no earlier than mid-2027).

Map out the compliance requirements for General-Purpose AI (GPAI) models under the EU AI Act and identify the key enforcement milestones in 2026. Analyze the transparency obligations, copyright policies, and systemic risk identification challenges faced by the open-source model community—using Mistral’s commercialization strategy and DeepSeek’s ultra-large-scale models as illustrative cases—in the European market, and examine their corresponding compliance responses.

Investigate TSMC’s January 2026 earnings call for disclosures on the yield performance and capacity ramp-up pace of the 2nm (N2) process, and concurrently verify the latest expectations regarding the construction progress of the A14 (1.4nm) fab in Zhongke and its 2028 mass-production target.
Analyze institutional allocation shifts between Bitcoin spot ETFs and newly listed Ethereum Staking yield index funds in Jan 2026, predicting the impact on global liquidity for Q1.

Collect key discussion points from the 2026 World Economic Forum (Davos) on AI-driven power bottlenecks and grid transformation, with a focus on the large-scale nuclear power purchase agreements reached by Meta and Vistra, as well as the latest progress on Microsoft’s Three Mile Island nuclear plant restart project.
Analyze the impact of TikTok’s 'AI Digital Twin Streaming' feature on SE Asian e-commerce, specifically regarding local job protection policy debates in Indonesia and Vietnam.

Investigate the compliance progress of global financial institutions in migrating to Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) standards in early 2026. Analyze the implementation status of NIST standards (e.g., FIPS 203), as well as the details of Google’s quantum-resistant cryptography updates deployed for Android and Chrome.
Reconstruct the African Union (AU) unified statement on 'Digital Sovereignty'. Analyze its impact on the competition between China's DSR and US Starlink expansion in Africa.
Survey severance package changes at Silicon Valley tech giants. Analyze real-world data reflecting the 'disappearance of middle management due to AI Agents.'
Track the 'Deepfake Voice Hijacking' attack path on global offshore data centers. Evaluate the security threat to US midterm election fundraising warm-ups.

nvestigate the policy shift in the Spring 2026 semester at universities such as Harvard and Stanford regarding the integration and disclosure of generative AI in teaching, and synthesize recent evaluation reports on the reliability of AI text detection and attribution tools (e.g., Proofademic) in hybrid human–AI co-creation scenarios.
Analyze recent Federal Reserve (Fed) meeting minutes and examine the specific coefficients by which large-scale AI adoption affects revisions to 2026 nonfarm payroll employment data.
Analyze the PBoC’s latest interface specifications for e-CNY cross-border payments, specifically the integration logic for BRICS payment platforms.
Map Silicon Valley VC funding in Jan 2026, analyzing the logic shift in valuation premiums for 'Embodied AI' during Seed and Series A rounds, and find Sequoia's latest post-investment statement.
Investigate the record low Antarctic sea ice data for Jan 2026. Correlate this with the surge in Carbon Credit market prices to analyze cost pressures on global shipping.
Reconstruct the key points of the second-instance ruling in NYT v. OpenAI in mid-Jan 2026, specifically the new definition of 'Fair Use' in RAG-based search scenarios.
Summarize the consensus and rifts between the US, EU, and China regarding 'AGI Verification Mechanisms.'
Analyze Singapore's 'Smart Streetlight Grid' data. Study how edge computing real-time scheduling for autonomous buses reduced traffic congestion.
Track the progress of China's 'Miyin Program' exoplanet detector scheduled for launch. Compare its complementarity with NASA’s Webb Telescope in deep-space imaging.
Investigate the transmission chain of the mutated Avian Flu (H5N1) in South Asia during early Jan 2026.
Survey the 'Unmanned Underwater Vehicle (UUV)' swarm saturation attack tests in late-Jan 2026 Black Sea exercises, analyzing defense challenges for traditional carrier groups.
Survey UN Human Rights Council report on 'Algorithmic Bias and Border ID Systems,' focusing on false positive rates in Mediterranean refugee camps.
Search for orbital prediction data for the 'Potentially Hazardous' asteroid, and find the first draft of the NASA/ESA Joint Defense Plan.
